main event: A large, glowing, multicolored object similar to a 'rainbow' in color and bright was observed traveling in a southerly direction for five and a half hours in Van Dyke, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was observed for a long duration of five and a half hours.
The object was described as large, glowing, and multicolored, similar to a 'rainbow' in appearance.
The object was traveling in a southerly direction.
The planet Mars was in the area at the time of the sighting, and inversion layers were also present, which may have contributed to the sighting.
The report concludes that the sighting was an unidentified flying object.
